fields.name: Dissolution Eon - Destroyer of Worlds (C1)
fields.value: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's charges by 1.

fields.name: Annihilation Eon - Blossom of Kaleidos (C2)
fields.value: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

fields.name: Evil Conqueror - Wrath Deity (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Transcension - Extinction of Suffering (C4)
fields.value: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

fields.name: Evolution Eon - Origin of Ignorance (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Bane of All Evil by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Evil Conqueror - Vigilant Yaksha (C6)
fields.value: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.
